title: What is the interpretation of a dream about my husband looking at others in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about my husband looking at others? Interpretation of a dream about my husband looking at another person in a dream. Many women ask about the interpretation of this vision and fear and anxiety appear on their faces, but jurists mentioned different connotations for this scene and pointed to omens, but on the condition that there are certain symbols in the dream You will know her. Currently.You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about my husband looking at others. Psychologists have placed an important sign to explain the vision of my husband looking at others, which is the fear of failure of the relationship or discovering the husband’s infidelity one day, or more precisely, the dreamer may suffer. From anxiety disorder and obsessive-compulsive disorder, always doubting her husband and mistakenly believing that he knows other women. As for the interpretation scholars, they said that dreams of marital infidelity to a large extent will be the work of the accursed Satan, and if the dreamer from God has a pious and pious wife and sees his appearance strange in a dream and caresses him. The woman is in front of her, incarnating Satan in the image of her husband to make her hate him and spoil her relationship with him. If the dreamer is married to one of the unfaithful men who practice mischief with strangers and she sees him looking at the charm of an unknown woman, then the scene assures her that he is still a bad person and is committing indecency. Interpretation of a dream about my husband looking To another person, Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin did not accurately explain a man’s opinion of a woman other than his wife in a dream, but he did give a clear explanation for the betrayal of his wife’s husband, and he said that it shows the sins of this man and if this dream is repeated. It will be a clear warning to the dreamer of the need to stay away from him because her life with him will be sad, and her house also lacks blessing because the head of the family is a corrupt person and far from God. If the dreamer sees her husband looking at another woman, but the look was not a look of admiration, but rather a look of anger and revenge, then the vision It means a fight occurred between the husband and this woman, and there is enmity and hatred. Between them in reality. Interpretation of a dream about my husband looking at another married person. Seeing a married woman whose husband looks at women in a dream, flirting with them with obscene words and outside the field of literature, knowing that she saw him wearing red clothes, the general symbols of the dream show her husband’s interest in desires, and indeed he recognizes the woman and shows The behavior between them is outside the scope of Sharia and religion, and this is due to his lack of religiosity. If a woman dreams of her husband looking at a beautiful woman in a dream and having sex between them, then he is looking at his future goals and seeking them with all his energy, and the intercourse that the dreamer saw is evidence of the fulfillment of his ambitions. Reaching the desired achievements, and thus the interpretation of the vision is outside the scope of betrayal, except that it explains that her husband is ambitious and pays greater attention in his life to work and money.Interpretation of a dream about my husband when he looks at another person for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees her husband looking at another woman and they have a nice conversation, or She saw him committing adultery with her and she knows that this woman looks beautiful, this is a beautiful child that the fortune teller will give birth to and give birth to her. Food comes to the household. If a pregnant woman sees her husband looking at a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of a tooth in a dream: Seeing a tooth in a dream, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Contents: A dream about a molar in an unmarried girl and a married woman A pregnant woman’s dream about teeth falling out, a broken molar, and the removal of Imam al-Sadiq’s molar. The meaning of seeing a molar in a dream Whoever sees that his teeth are moving, this means that he will get sick. Whoever sees that his teeth have fallen out or are missing, this indicates that the owner of the vision will die. Whoever sees in his dream that his teeth are eroded, this means that a wound and calamity will befall the owner of the vision. Whoever sees his teeth swinging in his dream, this means that his family is arguing with each other. Whoever sees in his teeth what he hates to see shows a mistake in his family. Whoever sees the bad smell of teeth is interpreted as a bad reputation for his family. Whoever sees that he is cleaning his teeth in a dream, this means that he spends his money to provide comfort for his family. Whoever sees that his teeth are white, beautiful, and long, this means that the family of the visionary will have money and will have a lot of power. Whoever sees that he is cutting his teeth means that he is cut off from him or that the owner of the vision spends his money without his consent. Whoever sees that his teeth are made of gold, if the dreamer is a scholar or a poet, this is a good vision for both of them, and it is good for them. If he sees If a person dreams that his teeth are silver, this is evidence that he will lose his money. And whoever sees that his teeth are made of glass or wood, his dream indicates death. Whoever sees that his front teeth have fallen out and other teeth have come out in their place, according to the interpretation of Imam Ibn Sirin, his condition will change and his condition will change, and he has reached another interpretation, which is that whoever sees this that his teeth are falling into his hands, this indicates the sustenance that he will obtain from money. Whoever sees that his upper teeth are falling on his thighs (his lap), this indicates that he will bear a son, and if his teeth fall to the ground, this indicates death. In another interpretation, it was said that the falling of teeth indicates the repayment of debt. In another interpretation, whoever’s teeth fall out and then disappear and he no longer sees, this dream indicates that his family will die before him. Whoever sees that there are teeth in his heart, his death is interpreted by whoever sees that his teeth are broken, this is a dream that shows that he will gradually repay his debt. And the person whose teeth fell out in a dream without feeling pain, this indicates the invalidity of his actions, and if he feels pain, this indicates that he will lose something from his home. The molar appears in the teeth of betrayal by those who appear Teeth, such as parents, children, and spouses, may have reached his family and they need to change them. And molars in the dream of elders and what comes out of human molars. It indicates a lack of money or the soul. And whoever dreams of pulling out his tooth dies, and it was said: If he has a debt, God Almighty will save him from it, or if he has a trust, he will pay him. His owner. And whoever sees that one of his molars hurts him, he will hear bad words from his relatives. To remove the molar in a dream The dreamer's vision of a molar being saved from the upper layer in the dreamer's lap may be evidence that he will be blessed with a righteous child in this world, and whoever sees his tooth falling to the ground, this means that the dreamer carries some evils. Which he must get rid of before his death to please God Almighty. A pregnant woman's dream of pulling out her tooth If a pregnant woman sees that her molar is coming out, this means that she will give birth to a male, and this is evidence of the good news that will come

In case the dreamer sees her cousin’s divorce, it may be an indication of marital strife, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her cousin’s daughter divorced, this may indicate marital problems and disputes, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees his cousin’s daughter divorced, This may be a sign of a problem in her life, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about chickpeas according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about chickpeas in a dream according to Al-Osaimi, as chickpeas are considered one of the most important types of food. It is what many people prefer and is included in many meals, and sometimes it is eaten as an appetizer and is included in many principles, but the appearance of chickpeas in a dream has many interpretations that we learn about in our article today. See Also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing chickpeas in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Interpretation of a dream of chickpeas in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Seeing chickpeas in a dream has many different interpretations by the great scholar Al-Osaimi, which are represented in the following points: The scholar Al-Osaimi interpreted the dream of chickpeas with many different indicators that vary according to the state of the dreamer’s meaning. On joy and pleasure and other interpretations that indicate problems and worries. Seeing dried chickpeas in a dream means that there are many problems and troubles in obtaining money and not managing the financial circumstances of the dreamer, whether male or female. Seeing cooked chickpeas in a dream indicates progress, joy, expansion of money and access. To all the ambitions that the dreamer is looking for. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a girl shrinking in a dream by Bint Al-Osaimi. The unmarried girl has many impressions and internal thoughts that are reflected in her dreams, and the interpretations of this dream are as follows: The vision of eating dry chickpeas in Dreaming of an unmarried girl indicates the dreamer’s close association with a man with bad morals. Seeing cooked chickpeas in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the progress and joy enjoyed by the dreamer. See also: Backgrounds in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of seeing chickpeas in a dream for a married womanThe married woman has some different interpretations of this The vision, which is as follows: Seeing chickpeas in a married woman’s dream indicates the joy and comfort that the dreamer enjoys. Seeing chickpeas being cooked in a married woman’s dream indicates that happy things will happen to the dreamer and that she will give birth soon, God willing. Seeing dry chickpeas in a married woman’s dream indicates The problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces in her life and her failure to manage matters. Seeing cooked chickpeas in a married woman’s dream indicates a long life and access to everything the dreamer wants. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about chickpeas in a man’s dream about Assam. A man’s dreams differ from those of a woman or The girl has different ideas and impressions, so we offer you a set of interpretations about the appearance of this vision in a man’s dream, which are as follows: Seeing the search for chickpeas in a man’s dream means searching for money and blessings for the dreamer. Seeing cooked chickpeas in a man’s dream indicates that you will rise to a higher rank. And it expands in money, and achieves what the dreamer aspires to. Seeing himself eating fresh chickpeas in the dream of an unmarried person indicates that he will marry a girl with good morals and a resume. title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing a scorpion in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a yellow scorpion in a dream? It indicates the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life. The interpretation of seeing a yellow scorpion being killed in a dream? It announces liberation from enemies. What is the interpretation of a dream about a man eating scorpion meat? It indicates the sins he commits. The meaning of seeing him eating scorpion meat Uncooked? It indicates the prohibited money that you will obtain. What is the interpretation of seeing a scorpion in a pregnant woman’s dream? Details of the crises and problems that fall within it. Interpretation of seeing a scorpion in a dream. Seeing a yellow scorpion in a dream indicates the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life. Then whoever sees it in a dream That he was stung by a yellow scorpion, this indicates the betrayal to which he is exposed to those close to him. Killing a yellow scorpion in a dream means getting rid of enemies. Then seeing a scorpion indicates a paralyzed and harmed person. Interpretation of seeing a scorpion hitting an unmarried woman. A scorpion in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates The worries that she suffers from. If she sees that she is hitting a scorpion, this indicates that there are many enemies in her life. Then if an unmarried woman sees that a scorpion is burning, then she will know her enemies and take care of them. If he eats scorpion meat in a dream, this indicates that he will be exposed to problems. Many. Then seeing a scorpion in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of this girl’s illness. Seeing a scorpion killing a man. A man who sees a scorpion in a dream indicates that there are enemies waiting for him. After that, if a man kills a scorpion in a dream, this indicates that he knows his true enemy. Eating scorpion meat in a dream indicates the sins he commits. Then seeing a scorpion taking a piece of cloth out of its mouth indicates the presence of an enemy among that dreamer’s relatives. When an unmarried young man sees a scorpion in a dream, he will face many problems. After that, the Seeing a scorpion burning in a dream for a single person means getting rid of enemies. Then, if you see a scorpion stinging a young man in a dream, this means that enemies are waiting for him. Interpretation of seeing a scorpion for a married woman A scorpion in a married woman’s dream indicates enemies. Then seeing a scorpion killing a married woman indicates that he He discovers enemies. Burning a scorpion in a married woman’s dream indicates the death of all her enemies. Then if a married woman eats a scorpion in a dream, this indicates that she is deprived of money. Seeing a scorpion in a pregnant woman Seeing a scorpion in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the crises and problems that will happen to her. After that, Seeing a scorpion in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates some problems that she will face during childbirth. Then, if he sees that he is eating uncooked scorpion meat, this indicates that it is forbidden for him.

Then seeing a scorpion taking a piece of cloth out of its mouth indicates the presence of an enemy among that dreamer’s relatives. When an unmarried young man sees a scorpion in a dream, he will face many problems. After that, the Seeing a scorpion burning in a dream for a single person means getting rid of enemies. Then, if you see a scorpion stinging a young man in a dream, this means that enemies are waiting for him. Interpretation of seeing a scorpion for a married woman A scorpion in a married woman’s dream indicates enemies. Then seeing a scorpion killing a married woman indicates that he He discovers enemies. Burning a scorpion in a married woman’s dream indicates the death of all her enemies. Then if a married woman eats a scorpion in a dream, this indicates that she is deprived of money. Seeing a scorpion in a pregnant woman Seeing a scorpion in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the crises and problems that will happen to her. After that, Seeing a scorpion in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates some problems that she will face during childbirth. Then, if he sees that he is eating uncooked scorpion meat, this indicates that it is forbidden for him.

title: Interpretation of dreams for my husband marrying me and I am crying

A sign of the problems that this girl is going through, but God will bless her with her death. The previous vision may be an indication that this girl will be officially engaged, but the engagement will be canceled. When the girl sees herself In a dream with a man. The previous dream may be a sign that God will comfort her until the anxiety goes away and goodness comes with a decree. God. A husband’s marriage to a married woman in a dream indicates that she and her husband have a strong relationship. She also has a lot of trust in her husband if he does not regret On her sleep. A husband marrying his wife in a dream is a sign for her of the unhealthy decisions she makes. It could be a warning about those decisions she makes and lead her to something that is unpopular with her husband, if she is sad in a dream. And that he has a social status, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If he sees himself marrying a dead woman, this dream indicates that he was far away from him. Or he takes her, but God provides for her and takes her. A man’s marriage to a Jewish woman is not good for the man, and he must hurry and repent before it is too late. title: Detailed interpretation of a blanket in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a blanket in a dream is the title of our article today, because the blanket is one of the most common furnishings found in almost every home and we cannot abandon it due to its great importance, especially in the cold season. Therefore, its presence in a dream, as scholars said and agreed upon, has great repercussions in the dream for those who see it and have interpretations. Therefore, during our article today, we will discuss the interpretation of the blanket in a dream according to the opinions of interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi, as well as the repercussions of the interpretation of the blanket on a married man. Or the woman, the girl, and the pregnant woman in detail in the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of the blanket in a dream Seeing the blanket in a dream according to Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that if the blanket is new in the dreamer’s dream, it is a sign of the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty and His justice. If the blanket in the dreamer’s dream is black, this is a sign On the envy and hatred that the dreamer suffers from in his life and affects him. If the dreamer washes the blanket in his dream, this indicates that the dreamer helps others all the time. And if the dreamer sees himself taking the blanket at night in his dream, this is a sign of his marriage to a beautiful girl who will cover him and help him Ibn Sirin believes that the blanket in the dream of a single person or person indicates marriage in the near future or obtaining a job or work that the dreamer desires. Seeing a blanket in a dream in Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that the dreamer’s seeing a dirty blanket in his dream was a sign of betrayal to which the dreamer will be exposed. If the dreamer sees the blanket in his sleep clean and with a fragrant smell, this is evidence of his success and success. But if the dreamer sees the blanket in general in his dream, it is a sign of the strength and comfort that the dreamer feels, and an indication of sustenance, abundance of money and psychological comfort. As for seeing the blanket Lying on the bed in the dreamer’s dream, it is a sign of the happiness and psychological comfort that the dreamer experiences in his life. The blanket in a man’s dream. If the dreamer sees the blanket in his dream, this indicates the stability, love, and anxiety that he feels in the dreamer’s life and the stability of his relationship with his wife and children. If the dreamer sees himself giving A blanket for his wife in his dream is a sign that he will become pregnant soon, and it is one of the most beautiful good news that awaits her, especially married women, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If the blanket is white in a man’s dream, this is evidence that his wife loves and obeys him, has good character, and has a good reputation. The blanket in an individual’s dream. Whoever sees in her dream the blanket that covers her entire body, then this is a sign of kindness, cover, and abundant food for the dreamer, which makes her very happy, and it is one of the most The beloved and glorified visions among the visions. However, if an unmarried woman or an unmarried girl sees that the blanket is white in her dream, this indicates her desire to get married and cover up, and it may be a harbinger of her imminent marriage. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees a clean blanket with a fragrant and fragrant smell, this is evidence of The imminence of her marriage to a person whose religion and morals she accepts, or his abundant kindness on the way to her. As for an impure or damaged blanket, it is a sign of the presence of

title: Interpretation of a dream about descending the stairs with fear

preview.html: In this article, we will show you the comprehensive explanation of ascending and descending the stairs, so follow the following lines from an interpreter’s website to learn more. Interpretation of a dream of descending the stairs with fear: Seeing yourself walking down the stairs in fear in a dream indicates anxiety and reluctance to make decisions related to crucial issues in the dreamer’s life. Going down the stairs in fear in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is about to experience a new experience and is afraid of its consequences. This vision expresses the dreamer’s transition from one state to a lower state, and this makes him afraid of not adapting to the new state. It is also said that going down the stairs with care and attention in The dream. Evidence that the fortuneteller is a traditional person who does not like adventure and is afraid of new experiences. As well as going down a broken staircase in a dream from unpleasant visions. Which indicates a lot of troubles, problems and suffering in the dreamer’s life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase for a married woman and a woman A single woman and a man. Interpretation of seeing a staircase in a dream for a single girl. The staircase in a girl’s dream symbolizes life and worldly matters. The stronger the staircase is and in good condition, the better her life will be, God willing. To see yourself climbing the stairs in a dream means that you are struggling and striving to achieve goals and achieve the desired, and God knows best. Climbing the stairs quickly in a dream expresses the dreamer’s enjoyment of a strong personality and an iron will that makes her independent from those around her, and she does not like to depend on anyone. Seeing yourself descending the stairs quickly in a dream means failure, whether at work or study. It has also been said that the dreamer is suffering from pressure. Psychological. Going down the stairs slowly and staying in the dream is a sign. However, the dreamer is about to enter into an emotional relationship and is thinking a lot before entering into this experience. Interpretation of seeing the stairs in a dream for a married woman. The stairs in a married woman’s dream indicates her financial and family situation, and the more The stairs were rickety and old, her life went from bad to worse. Climbing the stairs with difficulty in a dream is a sign that her financial situation is improving, but slowly and with great effort and effort, and God knows best. Climbing the stairs quickly in a dream is evidence of a successful life, an abundance of kindness and livelihood, and a good condition for the husband and children. Cleaning the stairs in a dream is an expression of caring for children, and seeing a broken stairs in a dream is not good and represents the death of the husband. Going down the stairs quickly in a dream is evidence of her losing her position and position among people. Going down the stairs is a sign of divorce, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing falling or Falling in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing a ladder in a dream for a man and its meaningSeeing a ladder in a man’s dream means that things in his life are going well. Whoever sees the ladder on the ground, this is a sign of illness. Al-Nabulsi says that climbing a new ladder in a man’s dream is good news and sustenance in this world and the hereafter. Either the old peace, expresses depression in trade. To see yourself climbing stairs in a dream means success and progress in life, God willing. Whoever climbs a ladder until he reaches its end will reach his goal. Whoever climbs the ladder carrying something heavy, it will be difficult.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the letter Ha in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams by Imam Al-Sadiq, letter H. Imam Al-Sadiq is one of the greatest and most famous scholars of interpretation who specializes in the field of interpretation of dreams and visions, and he has many books on the interpretation of dreams, so in this article we will discuss one of his interpretations on the interpretation of dreams. Dreams that begin with the letter H are for all types of dreamers. Interpretation of dreams written by Imam Al-Sadiq The letter H We will now explain to you some interpretations and interpretations of the letter H, which were explained by Imam Al-Sadiq. When a person sees a wall in his dream, this dream indicates an invincible man, while if he sees the fabric, it means that he will travel If a person sees his eyebrows close together in a dream, this dream shows love and familiarity. However, if he sees his eyebrows descending under his eyes, this indicates the dreamer’s long life and a change in his situation. Love in the dream is anxiety, sadness, and sorrow for the dreamer, while seeing the black seed indicates that the dreamer enjoys good health. And well-being.Interpretation of a dream about a rope in a dream for a married woman. We now show you the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a dream, as interpreted by Imam Al-Sadiq, and it is as follows.If a married woman sees a rope in her dream, then this dream indicates that she is a strong woman who has the ability to withstand and overcome the crises that she is exposed to. For her. Whereas if a married woman sees in her dream that she is tied with a rope, this dream indicates that some people are trying to prevent her from achieving her goals and ambitions. Interpretation of a dream about the letter H in a dream about a single girl. We will now show you some interpretations and explanations for seeing an unmarried woman dreaming of the letter H in Her dream as interpreted by Imam Al-Sadiq. He says that if an unmarried girl dreams that she is pregnant, then this dream indicates that she will get married soon. While if she sees a basin of water, then this dream indicates that she will soon have a generous and generous husband. And bathing in the unmarried girl’s dream It indicates kindness and blessings in her life, and if an unmarried girl gets sick and sees that she is shaving her hair, this indicates that she will soon recover from her illness. Interpretations of a dream with the letter Ha for pregnant womenWe will now explain to you some interpretations and interpretations of the letter Ha except for a pregnant woman according to Imam Al-Sadiq. She says that when a pregnant woman sees A rope in her dream, then this dream shows her fear and anxiety about pregnancy and childbirth. While if she sees a pregnant woman in her dream, this dream indicates that she is going through many difficulties and crises in her life. A chameleon in a pregnant woman’s dream shows her intelligence and her ability to coexist and adapt to everything Interpretation of a dream about the letter Ha for a man. Interpretations of dreams vary from man to woman, and we will explain below some interpretations of a dream about the letter Ha for a man from Imam Al-Sadiq. He says that if a person sees in a dream that he is wearing shoes suitable for his feet, then this dream shows the happiness and comfort that that man experiences. But if he sees In a person’s dream that he is carrying a rope, this dream indicates that he has a degree of justice, religion, and piety. Interpretation of a dream about the letter “Ha” for a widowed lady: We are now presenting to you some interpretations and interpretations regarding the letter “Ha” for a widowed lady, as explained by Imam Al-Sadiq. About

title: Interpretation of wind in a dream is the correct comprehensive interpretation

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of wind in a dream. In this article, God Almighty said: “O rulers, benefit me from my vision if I translate it into a vision” (43). Do dreams differ from one person to another, and is the dream world different from the real world? Where you can see all your desires and dreams, and you can also see all your fears, and the strange visions that some people see in their dreams. Seeing the wind, which today’s encyclopedia offers its various interpretations, follow us. Interpretation of the wind in a dream Seeing the wind in a dream In general, it symbolizes the dreamer’s victory over his enemies. If a merchant sees the wind in a dream A dream. It is one of the good visions that predicts abundant profits for him. As for seeing the wind in Manan as a means of transportation, it transported the dreamer from his home to another place that he does not know. This vision symbolizes that he will get a lot of money during the trip. Another interpretation of seeing the wind is if it attacks a specific place. It is a sign of the wrath of Almighty God upon the people in that place. As for seeing black wind in a dream. It symbolizes the occurrence of many misfortunes, material losses, the loss of a relative of the god, or the death of the monarch. As for those who see the wind carrying black sand. This vision indicates the financial crisis that the person is going through. Seeing the yellow sand wind spreading throughout the city dwells in it without causing any harm. It expresses the prosperity that is falling on the country. Interpretation of a dream about strong winds inside the house: If one sees in a dream that strong winds are flooding the house, but without causing any damage. This vision expresses the good news and happy events that will come to the dreamer’s life in the coming period. If the young man sees in his dream the presence of winds bombing his house. This vision expresses the emergence of many problems approaching his life, but they will end as quickly as possible. A man sees the wind entering his house and filling it with dust. This vision indicates exposure to some problems that will end quickly. But if the wind entering the house leaves traces where it hit? This vision indicates the problems that the dreamer will face and that these problems will leave their impact after they are over. If a married woman sees the wind entering her house and she feels anxious and afraid. This is a sign that problems are coming to her, but they will end as soon as possible. If she sees light winds and breeze entering her house. This vision expresses the end of all her worries and problems and the recovery of the sick person. The married woman’s vision of the wind blowing into her house and carrying her to her husband and going with him symbolizes his promotion at work and a change in his situation for the better, and it also symbolizes his travels to another place. The unmarried girl saw the wind blowing from the windows The house was not carried by these winds of dust. This vision symbolizes the approach of goodness and happiness to the lives of the people of this house. If an unmarried girl sees a light wind entering the house. This vision symbolizes her short marriage, the approach of joys to their home, the healing of the sick, and the end of sorrows and troubles. In the event that strong winds enter the unmarried girl’s house and divide it into many things.

Interpretation of the wind in a dream Seeing the wind in a dream In general, it symbolizes the dreamer’s victory over his enemies. If a merchant sees the wind in a dream A dream. It is one of the good visions that predicts abundant profits for him. As for seeing the wind in Manan as a means of transportation, it transported the dreamer from his home to another place that he does not know. This vision symbolizes that he will get a lot of money during the trip. Another interpretation of seeing the wind is if it attacks a specific place. It is a sign of the wrath of Almighty God upon the people in that place. As for seeing black wind in a dream. It symbolizes the occurrence of many misfortunes, material losses, the loss of a relative of the god, or the death of the monarch. As for those who see the wind carrying black sand. This vision indicates the financial crisis that the person is going through. Seeing the yellow sand wind spreading throughout the city dwells in it without causing any harm. It expresses the prosperity that is falling on the country. Interpretation of a dream about strong winds inside the house: If one sees in a dream that strong winds are flooding the house, but without causing any damage. This vision expresses the good news and happy events that will come to the dreamer’s life in the coming period. If the young man sees in his dream the presence of winds bombing his house. This vision expresses the emergence of many problems approaching his life, but they will end as quickly as possible. A man sees the wind entering his house and filling it with dust. This vision indicates exposure to some problems that will end quickly. But if the wind entering the house leaves traces where it hit? This vision indicates the problems that the dreamer will face and that these problems will leave their impact after they are over. If a married woman sees the wind entering her house and she feels anxious and afraid. This is a sign that problems are coming to her, but they will end as soon as possible. If she sees light winds and breeze entering her house. This vision expresses the end of all her worries and problems and the recovery of the sick person. The married woman’s vision of the wind blowing into her house and carrying her to her husband and going with him symbolizes his promotion at work and a change in his situation for the better, and it also symbolizes his travels to another place. The unmarried girl saw the wind blowing from the windows The house was not carried by these winds of dust. This vision symbolizes the approach of goodness and happiness to the lives of the people of this house. If an unmarried girl sees a light wind entering the house. This vision symbolizes her short marriage, the approach of joys to their home, the healing of the sick, and the end of sorrows and troubles. In the event that strong winds enter the unmarried girl’s house and divide it into many things.
